Today, the Causeway Coast is seeing poor conditions with 7 ft @ 8s NNW swell and fresh 19 mph NNW winds, making it messy and blown out. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 4 ft @ 7s, but the fresh 21 mph NNW wind continues to create similar poor conditions. On the day after, the swell picks up slightly to 5 ft @ 6s, with 18 mph NNE winds, but still remains poor. Best: none.
